Package DynaBlast

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • DynaBlast.Creatures
      • DynaBlast.Character
  • public class Character
extends Creatures
    Class representing player's character class extends class @Creatures 4 different skins for character each has size of standard @Tile contains information about lives and score of the player
